title: How to Feed Your Worm Farm | Smash it Down & Add Some Browns!

tasks.task: Starting a worm farm and feeding it appropriately
subtasks: Adding food scraps to the worm farm
Shoving the food scraps down into the bedding material
Covering the added food scraps with browns (carbon-rich materials)
Repeating the process of shoving down and covering with browns as needed

tasks.task: Creating a mnemonic or song for the task
subtasks: Formulating a catchy phrase or tune related to feeding the worm farm
Memorizing and singing the created phrase or tune
